data.title: Travel to Hogwarts and beyond in Lego Harry Potter: Years 5
data.meta_description: Go to GamingNexus.com for news and reviews on video games, consoles, and PCs.
data.text:
Travel to Hogwarts and beyond in Lego Harry Potter: Years 5-7

by: Travis -

Muggles and wizards alike can both rejoice for the launch of Lego Harry Potter: Years 5-7. The latest game in the series continues the adventure of Harry Potter and his friends in the quest to defeat Voldemort. Experience the stories from the Order of the Phoenix, Half-Blood Prince, and Deathly Hallows in the quirky Lego format of past games. In addition, visit new locations including Grimmauld Place, Godricâ€™s Hollow and the Ministry of Magic.

Lego Harry Potter: Years 5-7 is available now for Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, PC, Wii, DS, 3DS, and PSP.
